snippet: Within days after tearing two knee ligaments against Washington in the next-to-last-game of the 2011 season, Peterson vowed to return for Sunday’s season opener.
lead_paragraph: Within days after tearing two knee ligaments against Washington in the next-to-last-game of the 2011 season, Peterson vowed to return for Sunday’s season opener.

headline.seo: Adrian Peterson Says He Is Ready, but Vikings Are Cautious
headline.main: Peterson Says He Is Ready, but Vikings Are Cautious
headline.print_headline: Peterson Says He Is Ready, but Vikings Are Cautious
